parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs. You can specify an asterisk (\*) as the value to match all applications. You can view the application name on the [Stream Management](~~197397~~) page of the ApsaraVideo Live console.

parameters.name: LiveStreamType
parameters.description: Specifies whether the live stream is ingested by a streamer or played by a client. Set the value to **publisher**, which specifies that the live stream is ingested by a streamer.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the ingested stream. You can view the stream name on the [Stream Management](~~197397~~) page of the ApsaraVideo Live console.
